snippet: An 11-year-old boy in Washington State was convicted Friday of conspiracy to commit first-degree murder in a plot against a female classmate.
lead_paragraph: An 11-year-old boy in Washington State was convicted Friday of conspiracy to commit first-degree murder in a plot against a female classmate.

headline.main: Fifth Grader Is Convicted in Murder Plot
headline.print_headline: Washington Fifth Grader, 11, Is Convicted in Murder Plot
